text: is a Japanese snowboarder. He competed in the 2009, 2011, 2013, 2015 and 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Japan Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Masaki Shiba
